comment._content: The caption is misleading.  That's Charlie Ebbets on the right.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: and Ebbets is spelled with one t not two. Here is another photo of him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Ebbets

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo shows his son, Charles H. Ebbets, Junior:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4909926247/]

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I just learned that the "H." in their names stands for "Hercules."  Makes you wonder if history would have turned out different if Charlie Sr.'s middle name had been "Ralph."

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Here's another Bain/LOC portrait of the elder Ebbets, in Bain's 1914 photostream, posted to Flickr on May 20, 2011:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5740524510/in/photostream/]
